name: sorting facility construction, for construction waste | sorting facility, for construction waste | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3258/documentation

Sorting plant with a construction waste throughput of 200'000 tons per year. Operation time 50 years.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



infrastructure materials including replacement parts during operation, transport and disposal of infastructure. Land use. Fuel oil demand from small administrative building. Operation time 50 years.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Technology used in Switzerland and Germany. Compatibility with other regions unknown.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Construction waste sorting plants usually feature a jaw or impact crusher. Here materials from a cone crusher are inventoried. Infrastructure materials are adapted from LCI for a rock crusher for gravel production. Reduced wear and tear from lower annual throughput in construction waste sorting plant (200kt/a) is heeded.
